title: Comcast’s Board Approves Separation of Versant Media Group, Inc. | Comcast Corporation
snippet: December 16, 2025 (the “record ... of Versant shares is expected to be completed after the close of trading on Nasdaq on · January 2, 2026 (the “distribution date”). The holders of Comcast Class A common stock entitled to receive the distribution will receive a book-entry account statement or a credit to their brokerage account reflecting their ownership of Versant ...

title: Versant Corporation - Wikipedia
snippet: In late 2012, after rejecting an offer by UNICOM Systems Inc., Versant Corporation announced it was being acquired by Actian Corporation, the commercial developer of Ingres and Vectorwise. The acquisition was promoted using the marketing term big data.

title: Versant - Wikipedia
snippet: Bravo will remain under NBCUniversal ownership, due to the network being a major provider of content to Peacock. Universal Kids was also excluded and was eventually closed on March 6, 2025. Initially referred to under the interim name "SpinCo", on May 6, 2025, it was announced that the company would be known as Versant...

title: VERSANT Spin Transaction | Comcast Corporation
snippet: The New Name of the Spin-off Was Revealed as VERSANT, Which Speaks to the Company’s Adaptability and Embraces the Opportunity to Shape a New, Modern Media Company · 05/06/25 · | David Novak to Chair Comcast’s “SpinCo” · 03/19/25 · | David Novak to Chair Comcast’s “SpinCo” ...

title: Comcast Sets Board of Directors for Versant Spin-Off Company
snippet: Comcast CEO Brian Roberts will own one-third of the voting interests in Versant (as he does in Comcast); however, Roberts will not serve on Versant board or management team. The Versant brands will reach over 65 million U.S.
